ing: 1 (16 ounce) can navy beans, drained and rinsed
1/2 cup Boston lager beer, such as Samuel AdamsÂ®
1 (1.25 ounce) package McCormickÂ® Tex-Mex Chili Seasoning Mix
des: "Bacon + Beans + Beer = Boston's best. Stir with brown sugar, ketchup and McCormickÂ® Tex-Mex Chili Seasoning Mix for a dip worthy of any game day spread. Top with Cheddar cheese, sour cream, green onion, and scoop away!"
ins:
Cook bacon and onion in large skillet on medium-high heat until bacon is crisp.
Stir in remaining ingredients. Bring to boil. Reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
